summary: Successfully implemented comprehensive copy/paste functionality for spreadsheet cells. Added keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+C/V), right-click context menu, visual feedback for copied cells, and system clipboard integration. All functionality is working with proper error handling and user experience enhancements.
current_status: Spreadsheet now has full copy/paste capabilities with multiple interaction methods. Users can copy and paste cell contents using keyboard shortcuts or context menu. Visual indicators and smart behavior enhance the user experience. Ready for testing and further development.
